title: I Give Half of My Life to You - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Sports
tags: Age Progression   Beautiful Female Lead   Child Protagonist   Childhood Love   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Kidnappings   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Unconditional Love
author: Chengnan hua kai   城南花开
description:
Due to the words of the fortune teller, Lin Miao, a blessed girl who could live a hundred years, was sent to the sick Yangzi of Young Master Yu who would not live long.

The young master who has been tortured by illness since childhood has a gloomy personality, until that day, when the weather was favorable, a girl arrived.

“They said I can live a hundred years, I’ll give you half, okay?”>
